column2: Mīdūn) is a town and commune located on the north east of Djerba in Medenine Governorate
column3: Tunisia. As of 2014 it had a population of 63

column1: The commune has an electrification rate of 99% and a drinking water connection rate of 84%. The commune also has 90 hotels under it's belt ranging from motels to luxurious 5 stars ones with a total capacity of 50000 beds making it the biggest tourist destination in Tunisia.
